column4: speak Japanese to the sushi chef
column6: who is Vietnamese.  He hands her a receipt.  I ask Son if she just spoke in Japanese and he said yes.  They all have to learn some Japanese and speak it behind the sushi bar...interesting.  I also noticed all of the servers are white
column7: well minus a couple.  That's also unconventional in a sushi restaurant
column9: the sushi chefs are all asian.  Something of no importance
